titles.title: Father Let Thy Kingdom Come (Triumphant Nice E

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Father let Thy kingdom come Let it come with living power Speak at length the final word Usher in the triumph hour{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As it came in days of old In the deepest hearts of men When Thy martyrs died for Thee Let it come O God again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tyrant thrones and idol shrines Let them from their place be hurled Enter on Thy better reign Wear the crown of this poor world{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh what long sad years have gone Since Thy Church was taught this prayer Oh what eyes have watched and wept For the dawning everywhere{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Break triumphant day of God Break at last our hearts to cheer Throbbing souls and holy songs Wait to hail Thy dawning here{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Empires temples scepters thrones May they all for God be won And in every human heart Father let Thy kingdom come{/lang-eng}
